scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cd docs && hugo server --disableFastRender" "rollup -w --config docs/rollup.config.js --context window --name createSequence"
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cd docs && hugo server --bind 0.0.0.0 --baseURL http://192.168.0.102:1313 --disableFastRender" "rollup -w --config docs/rollup.config.js --context window --name createSequence"
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup --compact -c --context window --name createSequence && cd docs && hugo --minify
